00055 #define TRUE  1
00056 #define FALSE 0
00057 
00058 #include <avr/io.h>
00059 #include <avr/interrupt.h>
00060 #include "i2c.h"
00061 
00062 uint8_t twiWriteBuffer[BUFFER_SIZE];
00063 uint8_t twiReadBuffer[BUFFER_SIZE]; 
00064 uint8_t writeInPointer;             
00065 uint8_t writeOutPointer;            
00066 uint8_t readInPointer;              
00067 uint8_t readOutPointer;             
00068 uint8_t readCount;                  
00069 uint8_t twiState = TWI_IDLE;        
00070 uint8_t twiTransactionType;         
00071 uint8_t twiLastError;               
00072 uint8_t twiDevice;                  
00074 /****************************************************************************/
00083 void twiInit(uint16_t bitRate)
00084 {
00085   if (bitRate > 400) bitRate = 400;
00086   uint16_t scale = (F_CPU/2000)/bitRate;
00087   uint8_t prescale = 0;
00088   while ((scale > 255) && (prescale < 4))
00089   {
00090     ++prescale;
00091     scale /= 4;
00092   }
00093   if (scale < 8) scale = 8;
00094   outb(TWBR,scale - 8);
00095   outb(TWSR,prescale);
00096 }
00097 /****************************************************************************/
00114 uint8_t twiErrorStatus(void)
00115 {
00116   if (twiState != TWI_IDLE)
00117     return 0xFF;    /* not done yet */
00118   return twiLastError;
00119 }
00120 
00121 /****************************************************************************/
00136 uint8_t twiCompletionStatus(void)
00137 {
00138   if (twiState != TWI_IDLE)
00139     return 0xFF;                            /* not done yet */
00140   if (writeInPointer != writeOutPointer)
00141     return 0x80+writeOutPointer;
00142   if (readInPointer != readCount)
00143     return 0x40+readInPointer;
00144   return 0;
00145 }
00146 
00147 /****************************************************************************/
00160 void twiSetupTransaction(uint8_t numBytes)
00161 {
00162   readCount = numBytes;
00163   readInPointer = 0;
00164   readOutPointer = 0;
00165   writeInPointer = 0;
00166   writeOutPointer = 0;
00167 }
00168 
00169 /****************************************************************************/
00179 uint8_t twiWriteByte(uint8_t dataByte)
00180 {
00181   if (writeInPointer > BUFFER_SIZE) return FALSE;
00182   twiWriteBuffer[writeInPointer++] = dataByte;
00183   return TRUE;
00184 }
00185 
00186 /****************************************************************************/
00198 uint8_t twiReadByte(void)
00199 {
00200   if (readOutPointer > BUFFER_SIZE) return 0xFF;
00201   return twiReadBuffer[readOutPointer++];
00202 }
00203 
00204 /****************************************************************************/
00220 uint8_t twiLaunch(uint8_t device)
00221 {
00222   while (twiState != TWI_IDLE);
00223   twiLastError = 0;
00224   twiDevice = device & 0xFE;                /* R/W bit 0 is overwritten*/
00225   if (writeInPointer > 0)                   /* something to send */
00226   {
00227     if (readCount > 0) twiTransactionType = ATOMIC_TRANSACTION;
00228     else twiTransactionType = WRITE_TRANSACTION;
00229   }
00230   else
00231   {
00232     if (readCount > 0) twiTransactionType = READ_TRANSACTION;
00233     else return FALSE;                      /* nothing to do */
00234   }
00235   outb(TWCR,TWI_CONTROL | _BV(TWSTA));      /* Send a start condition */
00236   twiState = TWI_START;
00237   sei();
00238   return TRUE;
00239 }
00240 /****************************************************************************/
00257 ISR(SIG_TWI)
00258 {
00259   uint8_t twiStatus = inb(TWSR) & 0xF8;     /* Mask out prescaler bits */
00260   switch (twiState)
00261   {
00265   case TWI_START:
00266     if ((twiStatus == TWI_START) || (twiStatus == TWI_REPEATED_START))
00267     {
00268       if (twiTransactionType == READ_TRANSACTION)
00269         outb(TWDR, twiDevice | _BV(0));     /* set up the SLA + R */
00270       else
00271         outb(TWDR, twiDevice);              /* or SLA + W */
00272       outb(TWCR,TWI_CONTROL);               /* send it */
00273       twiState = TWI_ADDRESS;
00274     }
00275 /* Returned status indicates some failure of the bus */
00276     else
00277     {
00278       twiLastError = twiStatus;             /* Error Code from status */
00279       twiState = TWI_IDLE;                  /* Abort transaction */
00280     }
00281     break;
00282 
00285   case TWI_ADDRESS:
00286     if (twiTransactionType == READ_TRANSACTION)
00287     {
00288       if (twiStatus == MR_SLA_ACK)          /* Accepted */
00289       {
00290         if (readCount == 1)                 /* check if only one */
00291           outb(TWCR,TWI_CONTROL);           /* Setup to NACK first byte */
00292         else
00293           outb(TWCR,TWI_CONTROL | _BV(TWEA)); /* Setup to ACK first byte */
00294         twiState = TWI_DATA_PHASE;
00295       }
00296 /* The device indicates that it cannot provide any data, so we will stop here.
00297 It may be that it is only temporary, but the program can try again later. */
00298       else if (twiStatus == MR_SLA_NACK)    /* Device cannot provide data */
00299       {
00300         outb(TWCR,TWI_STOP));               /* send Stop condition */
00301         twiState = TWI_IDLE;
00302       }
00303 /* Returned status indicates some failure of the bus */
00304       else
00305       {
00306         twiLastError = twiStatus;           /* SLA transmission error */
00307         twiState = TWI_IDLE;                /* Abort transaction */
00308       }
00309     }
00310 /* When the device address is successfully transmitted, prepare for writing
00311 the first data byte */
00312     else                                    /* Write transaction */
00313     {
00314       if (twiStatus == MT_SLA_ACK)          /* Accepted */
00315       {
00316         outb(TWDR, twiWriteBuffer[writeOutPointer++]);/* set up first byte */
00317         outb(TWCR,TWI_CONTROL);             /* send it */
00318         twiState = TWI_DATA_PHASE;
00319       }
00320 /* The device indicates that it cannot receive anything */
00321       else if (twiStatus == MT_SLA_NACK)    /* Device cannot accept any data */
00322       {
00323         outb(TWCR,TWI_STOP));               /* send Stop condition */
00324         twiState = TWI_IDLE;
00325       }
00326 /* Returned status indicates some failure of the bus */
00327       else
00328       {
00329         twiLastError = twiStatus;           /* SLA transmission error */
00330         twiState = TWI_IDLE;                /* Abort transaction */
00331       }
00332     }
00333     break;
00334 
00339   case TWI_DATA_PHASE:
00340     if (twiTransactionType == READ_TRANSACTION)
00341     {
00342       twiReadBuffer[readInPointer++] = inb(TWDR); /* get current byte */
00343       if (twiStatus == MR_DATA_ACK)         /* Accepted */
00344       {
00345         if (readInPointer == readCount)     /* Finished gracefully */
00346         {
00347           outb(TWCR,TWI_STOP));             /* send Stop condition */
00348           twiState = TWI_IDLE;              /* shut down transaction */
00349         }
00350         else if (readInPointer == (readCount-1))/* is next byte the last? */
00351           outb(TWCR,TWI_CONTROL);           /* Setup to NACK next byte */
00352         else
00353           outb(TWCR,TWI_CONTROL | _BV(TWEA)); /* Setup to ACK next byte */
00354       }
00355 /* The device indicates that it cannot receive any more data */
00356       else if (twiStatus == MR_DATA_NACK)   /* Device cannot accept more */
00357       {
00358         outb(TWCR,TWI_STOP));               /* send Stop condition */
00359         twiState = TWI_IDLE;
00360       }
00361 /* Returned status indicates some failure of the bus */
00362       else
00363       {
00364         twiLastError = MR_DATA_ACK;         /* DATA transmission error */
00365         twiState = TWI_IDLE;                /* Abort transaction */
00366       }
00367     }
00374     else                                    /* Write transaction */
00375     {
00376       if (twiStatus == MT_DATA_ACK)         /* Accepted */
00377       {
00378         if (writeOutPointer == writeInPointer)  /* Finished gracefully */
00379         {
00380           if ((twiTransactionType == ATOMIC_TRANSACTION))
00381           {
00382             twiTransactionType = READ_TRANSACTION;
00383             outb(TWCR,TWI_CONTROL | _BV(TWSTA));  /* Send repeated start */
00384             twiState = TWI_START;
00385           }
00386           else
00387           {
00388             outb(TWCR,TWI_STOP));           /* Stop condition */
00389             twiState = TWI_IDLE;            /* shut down transaction */
00390           }
00391         }
00392         else
00393         {
00394           outb(TWDR, twiWriteBuffer[writeOutPointer++]); /* next data byte */
00395           outb(TWCR,TWI_CONTROL);           /* send it */
00396         }
00397       }
00398 /* The device indicates that it cannot receive any more data */
00399       else if (twiStatus == MT_DATA_NACK)   /* Device cannot accept more */
00400       {
00401         outb(TWCR,TWI_STOP));               /* send Stop condition */
00402         twiState = TWI_IDLE;
00403       }
00404 /* Returned status indicates some failure of the bus */
00405       else
00406       {
00407         twiLastError = MT_DATA_ACK;         /* DATA transmission error */
00408         twiState = TWI_IDLE;                /* Abort transaction */
00409       }
00410     }
00411   }
00412 }
